WebGL test #0: context exists

WebGL test #23: attaching some shaders should give the expected list
WebGL test #24: attaching a shader and detaching it should leave an empty list
WebGL test #25: attaching some shaders and detaching them in same order should leave an empty list

WebGL test #27: attaching and detaching some shaders should leave the difference list
